availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Amanda McBee Howe in Scott County, Kentucky, on August 28, 1857. Father of Mary Howe and Anna Howe. Laborer in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 475A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 904.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, White Sulphur, p. 344A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, Film 000183225, p. 91.
